GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
list: fix a data-race around ep->rdllist

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 5d5d993f16be15d124be7b8ec71b28ef7b7dc3af, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit e59d3c64cba69b57263dff1d62838bc6a819ae37. For more details please see the references link.
